articles.author: Megan Henney
articles.title: High inflation is still a burden to Americans – especially parents, Fed survey shows - Fox Business
articles.description: A new report published by the Federal Reserve shows that a majority of Americans think that elevated inflation made their financial lives worse in 2023.
